name: iMASSAGE Pocket Edition
description:
___________________________________________

iMASSAGE Pocket Edition is a FREE app that turns your android phone into your own personal massager!

___________________________________________

Features:

_ 

40 Massage Functions 

An "alt" mode doubling the initial 20 massage functions to 40!

_

Always On

Will never turn off while using it!

_

3 Button Locking System

Prevents you from changing or pressing unwanted buttons.

_

FREE!

Completely free! No ads, no hidden pop ups, no micro-transactions.

_

*The massage functions and strength of this app vary depending on android phone in use.*

___________________________________________

Be sure to check out the other apps and games Thunderous Wizard Studios has to offer! Make sure to follow Thunderous Wizard Studios on Itch.io to keep up to date with all the new apps and games coming soon!

_

*Donations on Itch will go to the developer for future app and game development*
